title: Kalitinka
text:
Kalitinka () is a <a href="types%20of%20inhabited%20localities%20in%20Russia">rural locality</a> (a <a href="Village%23Russia">village</a>) in <a href="Kargopolsky%20District">Kargopolsky District</a>, <a href="Arkhangelsk%20Oblast">Arkhangelsk Oblast</a>, Russia. The population was 81 as of 2012.
Geography.
Kalitinka is located 17 km south of <a href="Kargopol">Kargopol</a> (the district's administrative centre) by road. Polupopovka is the nearest rural locality.
